/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, their colors muted under the clear blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of geometric patterns against the backdrop of the sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
